property.name: moduleName
property.formula: (select t.description from lst_field_category t where t.id=moduleId)

property.name: hasActive
property.formula: (select count(*) from app_lookuptable_fields t1 where t1.tableId=tableId and t1.genericidx=3)

property.name: hasDisplayOrder
property.formula: (select count(*) from app_lookuptable_fields t2 where t2.tableId=tableId and t2.genericidx=4)
